bless.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: if God blesses someone or something, he helps and protects them
bless.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to ask God to protect someone or something
bless.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: The couple later had their marriage blessed in their local parish church.
bless.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: Then the priest blesses the bread and wine.
